description: The Rho Heavyweight – their warmest base layer pant – is made for cold days and mixed output. On the move, the Polartec® Power Stretch® Pro stretches for outstanding freedom of movement. During rest phases – or when it gets really cold – the fleece’s soft brushed interior traps heat to keep you warm. The fleece’s durable nylon outer has a smooth face for comfort under layers, and a zippered thigh pocket secures small essentials.The Rho Heavyweight Bottom was previously the Rho AR Bottom.
name: Arcteryx Rho Heavyweight Bottoms - Mens

specs.value: Polartec® Power Stretch® Pro - 53% polyester, 38% nylon, 9% elastane - bluesign Approved Material
